meanings.definition: A person of great influence, power, or wealth.
meanings.sent1: The local magnates in town were respected for their generosity.
meanings.sent2: Business magnates often make important decisions that impact many people.
meanings.sent3: The magnates at the charity event were in a friendly competition to donate the most.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, he was known as the magnate of investments.
meanings.sent5: The magnates of the tech industry were like modern-day kings ruling their kingdoms.

meanings.definition: A leader or influential figure in a particular field or industry.
meanings.sent1: She was considered a magnate in the fashion world for her innovative designs.
meanings.sent2: The magnates of the music industry often discover and promote new talent.
meanings.sent3: The magnates of the art world gathered to discuss the latest trends in painting.
meanings.sent4: As a magnate of the automotive industry, he revolutionized car manufacturing.
meanings.sent5: The magnates of the entertainment industry were always in the spotlight.
